CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 10, 1957, pg. 17, reads: "Slums Growing in Homewood? - Hazardous Steps - Some Homewood residents apparently have no concern for the safety of their families or visitors. This is emphasized by existing conditions similar to the broken house steps shown above."
TitMainTitle: Dilapidated staircase with missing steps, in overgrown lawn with tree and shrubs, house in background, Homewood
